revision.comment: Link cleanup, added missing flavors, reworded some stuff
made berry names and a few other things a clickable text so that their respective pages can be made for more indepth information
changed wording from "farming points" to "farming tokens" as that is the proper ingame wordings.
Elaborated on berries in intro section, tried to add flavors and mutation methods but not sure if formatting will work for wider tables. Feel free to revert
